titles: Boanarges and Barnabas, or, Judgment and mercy for afflicted soules containing of [brace] meditations, soliloquies, and prayers / by Francis Quarles.
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: Printed by Rich. Cotes for Richard Royston, and Richard Lownes, and are to bee sold at the Vnicorn ...,
notes: Errors in paging: p. 19 misnumbered 15, p. 101-108 omitted in numbering, p. 206-207 misnumbered 196-197.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
